{"id":957922174,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1685135965,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"781 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/957922174/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sum in a Matrix","memory":"48 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int matrixSum(vector<vector<int>>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size(),m=nums[0].size();\n        int temp_score=INT_MIN,score=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                auto it=max_element(nums[j].begin(),nums[j].end());\n                if(temp_score<*it)\n                temp_score=*it;\n                *it=INT_MIN;\n            }\n            score+=temp_score;\n            temp_score=INT_MIN;\n        }\n        return(score);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sum-in-a-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
